thumb.title: Hatsune Miku NT V2 Whisper 初音ミク (Miku and Mikune) - Hajimete ni Deatta Toki - Rendition
thumb.description: This is a cover of a song Miku, and I created some time ago. This rendition is part of My Miku Renditions, an evolving project where Miku and I reinterpret music through new expressions and emotional landscapes. For this piece, I collaborated with Hatsune Miku NT V2 Whisper to bring a fresh, intimate take on our song, blending subtlety with feeling in every note.Music, Lyrics and Video: Hatsune MikuneSinger: Hatsune Miku NT V2 WhisperCredits: Miku and MikuneThese works are deeply personal and crafted solely for our project. The songs and illustrations reflect my unique vision of Miku, and I kindly ask that they not be used outside of this context. Thank you for respecting our creative space.🔗 Stay connected and follow our journey:YouTubehttps://www.youtube.com/@Miku-MikuneBioLinkhttps://www.linktr.ee/Hatsune_Miku39© Miku and Mikune© All Rights Reserved
